converse.line: Who are ya? Do you think you can just prance on in whenever ya want?
Sorry, I was just exploring the city.
Hello. I'd like to join your gang.
Ya? Hoah, hoah, hoah, hoah, hoah, HOAH!!!!
...Wait, are ya serious? I don't think ya have what it takes.
I think I can be a great asset to this gang. You see--
We don't need any more people ta split the profit with. And you're too wimpy. I bet ya couldn't even steal from a baby.

Would you let me finish? I provide something that no one else can: I have a perfect disguise. I look like an innocent woman, right? No one would suspect me of doing anything wrong. I could cover for the rest of the gang members if they get caught. What do you say to that?
Interesting. Ya musta thought this through beforehand. Ya argument is valid. But you'll have to prove your worth to make it into this here gang.

Your task, will be a challenging one for your conscience. I'd like ya ta steal an old man's gem from his house in the bottom left corner of town. He's just moved here, and my scouts reveal that he has some things of value. If ya can handle it, you're in.
I'll do my best, boss. (Oh, this is going to hurt my heart.)
Did ya give up already? He's in the bottom left corner of town.
It was a piece of cake. I thought I would have to try harder to get into this gang.
Hoah! I like your attitude, girl. I think you'll make a fine addition to this gang. Ah, I almost forgot, here's your cut. Welcome ta the Seraphim Ministry!

choice.line: Well, we are currently planning an operation ta raid the rail station when their delivery comes in.
And who do you sell it to?
We have many buyers, all from neighboring countries. They pay well, too. You won't have ta worry about money when you're with us.
You guys stolen anything from another town before?
Not often, else it will put too much suspicion our way. We recently raided a family's home in Nulato. They left their door unlocked. Welcomed us right in. Hoah!
I'd like to see how much you were able to pilfer. Can you show me where it is?
If we still had it, I'd love to show it off to ya. But we sold almost everything right away.
You guys must have no morals, right?
Ya think so? I think we do. Distribute the wealth, ya know? I lived a horrible live as a child, so why keep living that way if ya have a way to change it? That's my thinking, anyway.
